Announcements
Judo Canada Return to Judo Documents



Online Training for U14 Athletes

Mon 17:00-17:30
Judo Saskatchewan is offering Online Judo sessions for athletes ages 10 to 13 and all club coaches with High performance Coach Michael Horley.
 
The Online Zoom sessions will be Mondays from 5pm - 5:30pm starting in December. Athletes are asked to log on at 4:55pm. Focus will be on Agility, Balance, Coordination, and Judo Fundamentals while having fun at home!

For more information and the zoom link, contact Michael Horley at mikejudosask@gmail.com

Judo Saskatchewan is a member of Sask Sport and Judo Canada, which is recognized by the International Judo Federation as the governing body of Judo in Canada.
